title: XP Pro  Performance Edition 2010_by TJ_with added sata drivers
description: This is a re-upload of the last, very excellent XP Pro Performance Edition, originally created and uploaded by "TJ"in November 2010.You can update it through normal Windows updates if you wish, though I don't bother. Open the tj file to read more detail. There are only 2 things different with this upload. The download size is 12% bigger because it is not condensed into a rar archive. And I've added a couple of newer SATA drivers so I can install in AHCI mode on my ivy bridge z77 motherboard. This gives better performance with a ssd hard drive. I suggest first installing in ahci mode (set in bios, before Windows boot).If the computer then opens to Windows, great! all is good. If Windows does not boot up, re-install the Xp Performance Edition, (this only takes 10 or 15 minutes) in IDE mode, instead of ahci mode. ( Again, change sata mode in bios before installing.) If you are staying with mechanical, spinning hard disks that is fine. With ssds, it would be worthwhile to slipstream YOUR motherboards sata drivers onto the installation ISO with NLite. Instructions are on the net.   May this upload help out some other XP diehards
